Text:
Thanks, TxJag, appreciate your posts.  I've searched Pirate Bay for the following books to no avail.  Any chance you have them or could get them for me?

Carrying The Fire: An astronaut's Journeys   by Michael Collins

Deke: An Autobiography   by Donald K Slayton 

 Thanks for the time even if you can't find them.  CP
@ChromePony No luck. Looked in all my usual online sources and they aren't available out there (Retail wise they might be). The sharing channels don't.
